1.content: To wake and discover that somehow, during the night, you have shrunk down to only an inch in height is hugely unsettling. In a panic, you wonder what on Earth has happened to you. At least you are in the safety of your own home, surrounded by women and girls who love you. Taking care not to fall, you gradually climb down from your bed and head towards the door of your room. Leaving your room behind, you head out to look for help.
1.title: The Shrinking: Your adventure begins...

11.content:
You haven’t even decided what to do next when a shadow looms over you and you find yourself being picked up between two slender fingers. You find yourself trapped in someone’s hand and taken back to their room. Eventually, the fingers unfurl and you get your first glimpse of your captor. Your beautiful 22 year old sister, Emma, gazes down at you, a sardonic smile playing across her pillow soft lips. At 5' 5" tall, with a drop-dead gorgeous figure and lustrous long dark hair, she's a stunner. If it wasn't for the fact that she was your sister, she would be your ideal woman.

Emma's expression fills you with dread. Emma has always enjoyed tormenting you and humiliating you at every turn. Despite being utterly beautiful, she's selfish, sadistic and sexually aggressive. She is absolutely the last person you would have wanted to encounter… and now you are at her mercy.

“Well well well…” Emma smirks. “Looks like my useless little brother has FINALLY found a way to make himself useful!”

“I… I don’t know what you mean?” you whimper. “What the fuck has happened to me?”
Your older sister laughs, delighting in your unease.

“You’ve shrunk, little brother. You see, our family is special. The women are all witches… whereas the men…”

“What about the men?” you ask, a terrible fear gripping your heart. Something tells you that this is not going to end well for you.

“Oh, you’re special too, little brother. Every male child born to this family is cursed to shrink. We never know when it’ll happen and I think we’re all a little surprised that you have lasted as long as you have. We’ve all been SO excited, waiting for the day you finally shrank. Every single one of us hoped to be the one lucky enough to find you and, guess what? I get to be the lucky one! You’re all mine!”

“I still don’t understand.” you say, more confused than ever. “What do you want with me? How am I any use to you at this size?”

Emma grins wickedly. The tip of her tongue licks slowly across her lips, pink and wet. “That’s the best bit!” she says. “I’m going to EAT you, little brother. I'm going to swallow your tiny little body whole and digest you just like any other tasty little morsel. Then, after my body's finished with you, I'm gonna shit you out. After all, I always said that you were a shitty little brother, ha ha!”

“What the FUCK?” you yell (though your tiny voice is far too quiet to be heard outside your sister’s room). “You’ve gotta be joking!”

Emma laughs, savouring the moment. “I promise you that it’s no joke, little brother. I appreciate that this is a pretty big deal for you, though, so I’m going to give you a choice…”

114.content:
Emma laughs, savouring the moment. “I promise you that it’s no joke, little brother. I appreciate that this is a pretty big deal for you, though, so I’m going to give you a choice…”

You listen, with growing horror, to the options that Emma lists for you to choose from. What kind of a choice is it when every option ends with you sliding down her throat? Basically, Emma’s choices boil down to; get eaten now or let her humiliate you first and THEN get eaten. How could your life mean so little to her? To think that all your hopes and ambitions are over and the only future you have to look forward to is a slow digestion in your kinky sister’s tight and sexy belly. In her eyes, you are nothing more than food.

There is no way that you were going to give her the satisfaction of playing her sadistic games. Instead, although you hold out little hope, you feel that your only realistic option is to appeal to your sister’s good nature (so basically, you’re fucked). She looks at you, an impatient look in her eyes.

“Time’s up. So, what’s it gonna be, little brother?” she licks her lips slowly and expectantly.

You hold your hands out in a desperate appeal for mercy. “Please Emma!” you say. “I don’t want to be eaten!”

Emma grins, loving the sight of you in such abject fear. “Of course you don’t. None of the guys I’ve eaten ever WANT to end up in my belly, but they taste good all the same!” She laughs wickedly at the thought. "And I LOVE the feeling as they wiggle and struggle in my tummy, desperately trying to get out before they get digested." she winks at you. "I hope you wriggle for me, little bro."

“You’ve… you’ve eaten other guys?” You can’t disguise your shock at this revelation. You always knew that Emma had a mean streak… but this?

“Oh sure!” Emma is enjoying herself immensely. “Men are my absolute favourite food… and the best thing is, guys think I’m so hot that they’re practically lining up to go out with me. It’s like an all-you-can-eat buffet!” Emma giggles. “They’re all so desperate to get inside me. It’s actually kind of funny when you think about it. They think they’re gonna get lucky but instead… they just get eaten!”

It all makes a horrible kind of sense now. You’ve met several of Emma’s boyfriends over the years when she’s brought them back to the house for dinner (oh, how true that was!). Some of them had been really nice guys and you had often wondered why your sister’s relationships seemed so fleeting. Now you knew. Every one of the boys she had brought home had been devoured. Every single one had ended up inside your sister’s slim and sexy belly… and now you are going to take the same trip into Emma’s stomach to be digested for her amusement (and nutrition).

“No.... please Emma… You can’t do that to me! I’m your brother. Please, I’m begging you sis. PLEASE DON’T EAT ME!”

“Have you quite finished?” she asks. You stare defiantly back at her, speechless. “If it’s any consolation, I’m going to enjoy eating you most of all! Mom always said that the shrinking curse made the men in our family particularly delicious. I know she’s been hoping to eat you for years and I never really expected that I’d be the one to find you. I mean, I dreamed about it but I kinda always thought that Mom would get you in the end.”

“Please, sis. I’ll do anything you want, just…”

“No more begging, bro. All I want from you now is to taste good and to wriggle on the way down!” With that, your beautiful sister lifts you high into the air, dangling you right above her sensual mouth.

The tip of Emma’s sexy pink tongue slides out and sensually licks at her pillow soft lips and then her mouth opens wide, tongue stretching out like a slippery welcome mat. Her mouth is wet with saliva, clearly in anticipation of the tasty snack she’s about to enjoy. Her hot breath wafts over you. It’s fresh and minty as she has obviously recently brushed her strong white teeth. You have a sudden surreal empathy with food as you realise that there really is no escape for you now. You literally are your sister’s breakfast now!

You realise how foolish it was to think that you could ever have talked your sister out of this. You;ve never felt more terrified of anything in your life, and yet this feels strangely right at the same time. You realize that Emma is about to become your entire world. You see her hot wet tongue (oh so sexy!) glistening beneath you - eager to taste the scrumptious morsel dangling just above - and you see the dark mystery at the back of your sister’s throat waiting to welcome you into her, ready to accept her tasty little shrunken brother and take you down to where you truly belong... the soft warm confines of sexy Emma’'s hungry stomach (your new home).

The sight of your sister’s strong, sharp teeth is at once truly beautiful and yet deeply unnerving, as she lowers you closer and closer. You’ve always thought Emma’s smile is dazzling but now, staring at her sharp teeth in the knowledge that you’re about to become Emma’s breakfast snack, they seem even more lovely and terrifying. The view reminds you that there will be no escape for you once you’re inside your sister’s beautiful mouth. The prettiest smile in the world is ready to welcome you inside but once Emma’s beautiful jaws close behind you, those lovely teeth will never let you back out. You'll be hers to taste, to enjoy and, when she is ready, to swallow…
114.title: Begging Emma to be merciful

115.content:
“I can either devour you now, or we can play a fun game.” Emma said. You stared at her, unsure of what to say. Whatever game she had in mind would not be fun at all. Unfortunately, being tossed into those jaws wasn’t ideal either.

Though she claimed she would swallow you whole, you were still worried about her taking a bite. Due to past experiences, you knew her teeth were very strong. At this point, her teeth could destroy you in an instant.

“Even if I were to play your game, what good would it do?” You asked. The giantess smiled and laid down on her bed. She held you above her mouth, making you afraid.

“Well if we play, you get to survive a little longer and I get to watch you struggle one last time. Plus, if you win, I might consider letting you go.” She suggested. You absolutely knew she was lying and just wanted an excuse to torment you once more.

“How do I know that you’re telling the truth?”

“Well, you can’t. But look, here’s the deal: Either you entertain me for a bit or I give you a one way ticket into my belly right now. It’s your choice.” Before you could react, she brought you closer to her face and smelled you. She licked her lips, causing you to squirm. The sight of her overpowered tongue was enough to make you whimper. She moved you right over her mouth and smiled.

“Well squirt? What’s it going to be? Are you going to play with your…BIG sister? Or shall I just drop you in now?”

“Okay okay! I’ll play with you, just don’t eat me!” You pleaded on instinct. Your sister smiled and moved you away from her mouth. She sat up and gave a cruel smile.

“That’s a good boy. I promise we’ll have fun…well, I will at least.” You whimpered once more causing her to chuckle. You didn’t know if you made the right decision or not but you were going to find out soon.

“Soo, what game did you want to play?” You asked.

Option 1: She wanted to play cat and mouse with you. You would be the delicious mouse running away and she would be the sexy cat girl who gets to toy and chase you

Option 2: She was going to sit on you for a while and see how long you could last.

Option 3: She was going to set you on the ground and you had to climb all the way up to her head.

Option 4: She wanted to play truth or dare, one of her favorite games.

1153.content:
The giantess smiled at you and set you down on the ground. Though you considered running, you did say you were going to play with her. Emma suddenly started stripping down causing you to stare in awe. The giantess didn’t spare any clothing, leaving herself completely naked. She giggled as she saw your reaction.

“I’m glad you like what you see squirt because you get to climb this magnificent body.” She said.

“Wait, what?” You snapped back into focus and became worried.

“The game is simple. All you have to do is climb to the top of my head. I’ll even be a little generous and say that you can take as much time as you want. Feel free to stop anywhere at my body. If you get to my bellybutton, I’ll even let you drop onto my hand and take a rest.” She said. You gave a sigh.

“Ok, what’s the catch?”

“If you end up falling, consider it game over. Also, don’t be surprised if I decide to mess with you a bit. It is hard to resist playing with a tiny boy climbing up my sexy body.” She said.

“Ok, but why give me a rest then?”

“Easy, I want you to make it up pretty high. It’ll give me plenty of chances to tease and play with you. Now, you better start.” She said. She moved her foot closer to you and smiled. You nodded and hopped on.

Her foot wasn’t all that bad. Though it wasn’t a flower garden, it didn’t smell all that bad. Her feet were pretty nice as well, clean with nail polish. It wasn’t difficult to climb either. You worked your way up to her leg. It quickly became more difficult as you were moving straight up.

“Hey what if you decide to move?” You ask.

“Tell you what, I’ll give you a warning before I decide to move. The rules still apply though so don’t think you’re getting off that easy.”

You nodded and continued. You had to admit, your sister was being really nice today. Even though it was so that she could watch you struggle (and she wanted to gobble you up), they still made you a bit happy.

You soon got up to her pelvis and moved to the middle. Your logic was that it would be a bit more helpful to climb. Unfortunately, you hadn’t considered her vagina. As you reached it, you immediately blushed. The giantess giggled when she realized where you were.

“Ah, my special prison. Many boys have longed to find their way inside. Being the nice girl I am, I gave a few of them that permission before I turned them into my meal.” She said. You couldn’t help but smile a little at her words.

Option 1: Emma suddenly pushed you in and teased you.

Option 2: Emma tempted you to go inside her. She claimed it could be a place to rest up for a minute, though she didn’t promise she wouldn’t start rubbing herself a little.

Option 3: You couldn’t help but ask if she would consider being your girlfriend if you two hadn’t been related.

Option 4: Emma’s hot girlfriend came over for a visit and saw what was going on. She became excited and interested at what was happening.
1153.title: The start of the journey up Mt. Emma

Your gorgeous disciplinarian mother

12.content:
As you glance around the hallway, you can’t see anybody. You run over to the stairs and look down. The bottom floor seems miles away to you at your tiny size, making you nervous. Being out in the open is terrifying as it would be so easy for one of your now giant family to step on you by accident. You start to climb down the long staircase, taking your time with each stair.

When you reach the halfway mark, you suddenly hear a loud noise. Before you can identify it, a giant foot slams down onto the stair right next to you, causing you to fly towards the wall. As you recover, you gaze up in wonder up and see it your mother towering over you, oblivious to your tiny presence beneath her. She is currently wearing a thin lacy black nightgown that you can see right through to her bare skin. Underneath her filmy nightgown, she is wearing only a skimpy pair of black panties and a plain black bra. You've always felt guilty about the fact that you find your mother so attractive, but she is undeniably beautiful.

You completely freeze as she walks past. At her size, your mother is a literal goddess compared to you. If she wanted to (indeed if she had stepped a couple of inches to the left just now), she could obliterate you in an instant. It also occurs to you that attracting your mother's attention from here would be near impossible. You watch in shock and awe as she takes another step and continues her passage down the stairs.

Tentatively, you resume your arduous climb down the stairs until you reach the bottom. You think about the perils of your tiny size once again and are thankful there are no animals in your house. Your older sister, Emma, had wanted to get a cat a while back but your mother had stopped her. Your adventure continues until you reach the living room door. From there, you have a pretty good view of everyone in your family.

Aunt Jane is currently sitting on the couch, watching TV. She is a little chubby around the waist but has a great body otherwise. She has always treated you well enough, though she always favours her own daughters and frequently lets her oldest (11 year old Sophie) get away with taunting you.

Your mother has moved to the kitchen where she is preparing breakfast. Seeing her once again takes your breath away. She's utterly gorgeous and her disciplinarian nature can be something of a turn on at times. When you acted up, she would warn you (with a twinkle in her eye) that if you didn't behave yourself, she would "gobble you up" because "naughty boys make for the best eating". You had always loved it when she pretended to want to eat you, though it dawns on you that, at your current size, she really COULD gobble you up! Thank goodness she would never do that to you for real, you think to yourself. Over the years, she had protected you and was usually ready to help you when Sophie or Katie are getting out of control. Perhaps she would be the best person to help you now?

Your two young cousins, Sophie and Katie, are in the far corner. Katie is playing with her favourite doll. She looks so sweet and innocent with her cutesy blond curls and pretty blue eyes. Katie is a cute and playful little girl who has always enjoyed having fun with you. She can be clingy and is sometimes a little much, but you have always been fond of her. Katie's older sister, Sophie, on the other hand was very different.

Sophie sits watching her younger sister whilst stuffing her face with a cinnamon roll. Sophie is fat, selfish and had a decidedly cruel side. She's usually rude to you and considers herself better than you. The girl is also thoroughly spoiled. If there was anything she wants, she gets it 99% of the time. You feel very uneasy at the thought of being discovered by Sophie and shudder at the thought of what she might do to you.

As you look around more, you see your grandma head out to the backyard. She's always been a kindly old woman and been particularly loving and affectionate towards you. When you were little, she would tell you stories involving magic. It occurs to you that Sophie probably takes after your grandmother, as the old lady is certainly fat and adores her food. She has an enormous appetite and her belly seems to be a bottomless pit. Thankfully, that is where the similarity seems to end as your grandmother has only ever showed you love and kindness. You are sure she would look after you in your shrunken state.

Finally, you spot your 22 year old sister head downstairs into the basement. Emma is a beautiful and popular girl. At 5' 5" tall, with a drop-dead gorgeous figure and lustrous long dark hair, she's a stunner. If it wasn't for the fact that she was your sister, she would be your ideal woman. Emma has always enjoyed tormenting you and humiliating you at every turn. Despite being utterly beautiful, she's selfish, sadistic and sexually aggressive. You are usually pretty scared of her. You believe that she sees you as her own personal toy. Emma is also very strong meaning you couldn’t fight back, even at full size. Though your mother protected you from a lot of things, you were never safe from Emma. Indeed, if ever your mother was REALLY cross with you, she would let Emma come up with the punishment... which always seemed to involve Emma biting you. From bitter experience, you know Emma's perfect white teeth to be incredibly sharp and very VERY strong.

Now you know where everyone is, you wonder who you should get help from. The best options would probably be your Aunt Jane (who was the closest), your mother (who had always kept you safe), and your grandma (though she was the farthest). Trying to get help from Katie also wasn’t a bad idea, though Sophie’s presence scared you. You did consider Emma’s help as well. Although she had never been nice to you, she was still your sister. You believed that would be enough to earn her help.

After a moment of consideration, you decided to head towards…

121.content:
You are already exhausted from your mammoth trek down the stairs and into the main living area. For everyone else in the house, it is something to take for granted but, at your size, even crossing from one side of a room to the other is quite an undertaking (as well as being fraught with the risk of being accidentally stepped on). Your exhaustion from the hazardous trip here and fear of getting squished influences your decision and you come to the conclusion that your bubbly and fun loving Aunt Jane is probably the safest bet for now.

Cautiously, you make your way towards your Aunt Jane, who is sitting on the couch and watching TV. If only you can reach her and get her attention, you feel sure that she will help you. She’s always been fun and likes a giggle. Indeed, the only danger you can see posed by your Aunt Jane is if she were to give you to her oldest daughter, 11 year old Sophie. You don;’t think she would do that, but it is a slight worry as your Aunt Jane has always been prone to overindulge the spoiled brat and might think that Sophie would enjoy playing with her shrunken older cousin. You convince yourself that such an outcome is very unlikely and you decide to trust your future to the good nature of your Aunt. It’s probably the best option, given how much closer she is to you than your other best choices.

Catching your breath, you work out the best route to get to your Aunt Jane without leaving yourself too exposed. You can’t help but admire her curves. She’s an attractive woman with a somewhat curvier figure than your mother. Whilst certainly not fat, she’s buxom and curvaceous, with an adorable squishy tummy that you’ve always found wonderful for hugs and cuddles. Jane has long blonde hair, twinkling blue eyes and a penchant for glossy pink lipstick. Whilst you have always felt (understandably) ashamed of your attraction to your own mother, you find it easier to come to terms with finding your fun loving aunt to be sexually alluring. Indeed, she has almost seemed to encourage your affections with her playfully flirty attitude towards you. She’s always ready with a quick kiss on the cheek, a sexy wink and lick of her lips when she knows the others aren’t watching her and her propensity to show off her ample cleavage, flash her panties and tease you by calling you ‘loverboy’ and ‘nom nom’.

You are now more convinced than ever that your Aunt Jane is the right person to approach. You cautiously make your way across the floor until you are standing at her feet. She towers above you, completely oblivious to your tiny presence. Your Aunt Jane is wearing a figure hugging top that flaunts her ample bosom, as well as her sexy slightly chubby belly. She’s also wearing tight jeans, which make it difficult for you to climb her legs and get her attention. At that moment, Jane stands and turns off the television. She turns to your Mom, still enjoying her breakfast in the kitchen, and says:

“Where’s your scrumptious boy got to this morning, Deborah?”

Your Mom looks up from her breakfast and swallows the mouthful of toast and peanut butter that she had been chewing. “I haven’t seen him, sis. Why?”

“No reason. He’s just usually down by now. I guess I’m just wondering how much longer it’s going to be before he shrinks.”

You could hardly believe your ears. Your Aunt Jane was expecting you to shrink! What the hell was going on?

“I guess it won’t be much longer now. After all, he is 18. We’ll all just have to be extra-vigilant until it finally happens. We wouldn’t want him to get away, after all!” your Mom laughs.

You’re beginning to feel very uneasy about this. The way they are talking, it’s like everyone is expecting you to shrink at some point soon. As if that wasn’t disturbing enough, your Mom seems concerned that you might try to escape. After that remark, you are very glad that you hadn’t decided to approach your Mom for help. What on Earth is going on?

Your Aunt Jane laughed at your Mom’s strange remark. “You should be more trusting. Debs. Why would he try to run away? We’re his family, after all. He’s such a sweet boy. I’d be sure to take good care of him if I found him all shrunk and scared!”

“I bet you would!” your Mom replied. “You’ve always been soft on that kid. I know exactly how you’d take care of him!”

“Oh, you’re so right!” Jane chuckled. “I’d give him the ride of his life!”

Assessing your options, you decide that you are even more convinced your Aunt Jane is the best person to help you. Firstly, she obviously knows something about your shrinking. Secondly, unlike your Mom (who seems very keen not to let you ‘get away’), Jane is talking about looking after you and, if you have interpreted her saucy comment about giving you the ride of your life correctly, it even sounds like she has sexy plans for you. She’s about to leave the room and it appears that all your hard work to reach her will be in vain unless you act fast. Time to make your decision!

You try to grab on to your Aunt Jane’s shoe but she’s too fast and you’re left standing on the floor feeling far too exposed. Looking around in a panic, you are horrified to see that Sophie is staring back at you, an evil grin on her lips. She stuffs the last of her cinnamon roll into her mouth and chews noisily as she gets to her feet and walks purposefully towards you.

You know that you’re in real trouble now. Sophie is cruel, greedy, vindictive and utterly spoiled. Your fat cousin is getting nearer far too fast for your liking. She’s covering the equivalent of hundreds of feet with every step. You’ve barely made it halfway when Sophie’s fingers, still greasy and sticky from the cinnamon roll she has just eaten, close around you and snatch you up into the air. She holds you tightly in her pudgy fist, blocking out the light and muffling all sounds. You can hear her talking but can’t make out what she is saying. Then she leaves the room, taking you with her… but where is she going?

Sophie looks up at her mom, your Aunt Jane, a hopeful and longing expression in her eyes. "He looks soooo tasty, Mommy. I want to gobble him up!"

Jane smiles affectionately at her daughter. “Of course you do, my sweet. I must admit that I wish I’d been the one to find him first, but fair is fair and you get to be the lucky one! Are you sure you’ve got room for him right now, though? After all, you’ve just eaten a big breakfast AND you enjoyed that cinnamon roll. Maybe you should save him for later?”

You can’t believe what your Aunt Jane is saying. To think that you actually thought she might help you! “Please don’t do this!” you yell, but nobody is listening to you.

“It’s OK Mommy. I’m still hungry.” Sophie says. “I really want to eat him now!”

“If you’re sure, my sweet.”

“I am, Mommy, I am!” Sophie says delightedly.

“Well, you just run along and gobble him up then, you lucky girl! I hope he makes your tummy happy!” Your Aunt Jane then turns her attention back to you with a smile. “Awwww, bless! It’s so sweet that my Sophie gets to be the one to gobble you up! Enjoy the ride, little nephew!”

“No, please…!” you say, but Aunt Jane simply blows you a kiss. Sophie tightens her grip on you.

“Thanks Mommy!” she says. “He’s going to be sooo yummy in my tummy!” With that, Sophie runs off to her room so she can eat you in privacy.

121243.content:
Aunt Jane simply smiled at her and grabbed you. As Sophie started to complain, the giantess shushed her. She leaned down and whispered in her ear.

“If you behave, I’ll make your favorite dinner tonight.” Jane said. This seemed to calm Sophie down. The woman smiled and carried you off into her bedroom. You felt really glad you had chosen her.

When she entered the room, you sighed with relief. You truly believed you were in safe hands right now. Aunt Jane’s room felt comfortable. She had snacks, a TV, and a reclining chair. 1314143434.content:
You tried to run out as fast as you could. Unfortunately, Emma grabbed the bag before you could exit. As she lifted it up, you and your friend fell onto the snacks. Your friend quickly hugged you, afraid.

“Mm, these will be tasty.” You could hear Emma say. Your friend whimpered.

“This is it, we’re done for!” He said. You wanted to comfort him but you knew there was little point. As you saw before, Emma wasn’t about to hesitate. You held him for a minute before noticing the giantess hadn’t opened the bag yet. You could hear loud sounds meaning you were still in her grasp but you were becoming confused.

The bag started to shake a little bit more. You realized this was due to her walking somewhere. You assumed she was traveling to her bedroom only for you to hear someone else.

“That’s a lot of snacks, do you think that’ll be enough for the party?” The voice asked. It sounded familiar but you could tell it wasn’t someone from your family.

“Oh yeah, we’re not inviting that many people so it’ll be fine. I’m just glad you were able to come.” Emma said. The bag suddenly shook a lot before coming to a complete stop. You told your friend to stay put for a minute while you went to investigate.

“It’s too bad you lost him, I would have loved to play with him once more.” The voice said again. You peeked out of the whole to see who was speaking. After a moment, you saw her. It was an adult woman who looked to be in her early 30s. She had long blond hair and a nice figure. She was currently wearing a t-shirt and shorts. On her arm, you could see a tattoo of a rice ball. After a couple of minutes of staring at her, you suddenly pulled back in fear. You friend approached and looked at her before giving you a confused look.

“Do you know her?” He asked. You nodded, knowing exactly who she was.

“She’s…my babysitter.” You said.
—————
The woman’s name was Sarah. When you were five years old, she took care of you. One thing you remembered was that she was very open about you being prey. She liked playing games such as red riding hood or Hansel and Gretel (without Gretel). You also remembered she very clearly told you your family wanted to eat you.

She talked about how you would shrink one day and your family saw you as a treat. At the time, you enjoyed the idea. You told her you hoped your mother would be the one to eat you. Sarah smiled and gave you a hug.

“What about me? Would you like me to eat you?” She asked. You giggled and nodded.

“I would love to be in your belly! Can you eat me now please!” You asked excitedly. She simply laughed at your response.

“I’d love to but I don’t think your family would approve. We’ll just have to wait.” She said. You remembered you rubbed her grumbling belly.

“I’ll wait. I know it’ll be worth it.” You said. She smiled and gave you a kiss on the forehead.

“I’ll be looking forward to it.”
—————
After many years, you had completely forgotten about that. You didn’t really want to be eaten! At least…not now. You wondered who else was going to show up. If your old babysitter wanted to eat you, who else was a witch? You told your friend about her, causing his eyes to widen.

“You wanted her to eat you?”

“Ok come on, I was young and didn’t understand what would happen!” You protested. You looked out to see she and Emma eve setting up decorations.

“Well, what do we do?” He asked. You looked at your babysitter once more and thought about it.

Option 1: You decided to move now while they’re distracted. You and your friend make it under the couch and decide to stay there throughout the party.

Option 2: You decide to move now while they’re distracted. Sarah notices you and captures you two. Without telling Emma, she takes you to your bedroom to talk privately.

Option 3: You decide to stay put for now and hope for the best. After a couple more people show up (along with your family), the party starts.

Option 4: You decide to stay put for now and hope for the best. Emma soon becomes hungry and grabs the bag of Oreos. When she opens them, she spots both you and your friend and tells Sarah.
1314143434.title: An honest friend from long ago

choices: Movie and snacks
A board game with real pieces
More questions about the ancient one
Calming down and just having fun
Other
13141434341.content:
As they set up decorations, you grabbed your friend’s arm and charged out of the bag. You quickly slid down the leg of the table and rushed under the couch. The two of you stayed quiet and listened. Neither of the ladies seemed to move or change what they were doing.

“Ok, I think we’re safe for now. We’re just going to have to wait for a while.” You explained. Your friend nodded and sat down. You laid down as well and kept an eye on the door. You were really curious as to who was coming. After a little bit, the rest of your family returned with more supplies. They had also brought one of the guests with them.

The woman with them had short dark hair and was a bit plump. You immediately noticed she was in a police uniform and realized who she must be. Her name was Bethany and she was a “special cop”. Though you hadn’t met her personally, you heard stories about how she liked to deal with criminals herself. The woman also had complete control of the entire police force meaning there wasn’t much people could do to stop her.

“Hey, it’s nice to see you again!” Emma said giving her a hug. Bethany smiled and hugged her back.

“So, that little boy of yours has finally shrunk, huh? It’s too bad he’s got away.” She said. Your mother simply sighed.

“It was partially my fault. I got distracted by my mother here.” Your grandma shot her a dirty look causing Bethany to laugh.

“Remember, eyes on the prize.”

Once everything was ready, people started to sit down. Before your mother could sit down though, the doorbell suddenly rang. You could tell she was a bit confused as she went to answer it. When the door opened, your mother started to back up slowly. The whole room went silent as well. As soon as you saw who it was, you started to tremble.

“Who is that, another babysitter?” Your friend asked with a smile.

“Don’t even joke man! If you knew who she was, you would be crying right now!” You said, panicked and scared.

The woman had long silver hair and a beautiful body. She completely stood out as she was practically naked. The only thing she wore was a bra and a skirt that only covered the front and back of her pelvis. She had a star tattoo right where her bellybutton was, which was part of the reason why you knew who she was. Her eyes were completely closed as well.

The reason you were so afraid of her was because of who she was. This woman was simply referred to as the ancient one. Your grandma liked telling you stories but had always been careful about her. One story about her was that the Earth originally had a second sun. The ancient one had swallowed it up and it’s said her star tattoo is all that’s left from it.

“Ancient one…how nice to see you. What brings you to our humble little home?” Your mother asked. You could see was trembling a little as well. The woman smiled.

“Relax Deborah, I am here to join this party. May I come in?” She asked. Your mother nodded and stepped aside. Sophie gave her a confused look, clearly having no knowledge of her.

“Who is this weirdo? She looks dumb.” Sophie said. Everyone gasped at her except for the ancient one. “What? She doesn’t even have her eyes open.” The ancient one approached her and picked her up. Jane held her breath.

“I may not have sight like you little one but I can see more than you know. For instance, I can see that a few years ago you bit your sister to see what she tasted like. She tasted pretty bad and you told her not to tell anybody.” Sophie froze causing the woman to giggle. “Did you know that I’m the one who placed the curse on your family’s males? It was the price for their magic.” She set Sophie down and sat down on the couch.

“I am so sorry for her.” Jane said. Before any more words came out, the ancient one smiled.

“Don’t worry, I like this one.” Your sister soon became confused though.

“Hey, if you can see more than us, then do you know where…” She started to say, the woman nodded.

“I know precisely where he is. I also know things that would make you lose your mind. However, I won’t reveal him. It’s not time yet.” She said.

“She can’t be serious.” Your friend said. You simply looked at him.

“She’s telling the truth and trust me, we’re likely already dead because of her. If she decides she wants to eat us, I guarantee you it will happen.” You said. Your friend went silent and nodded.

Option 1: The group decides to watch a movie while eating snacks. The ancient one brought plenty of tiny people to enjoy as well.

Option 2: The group decides to play a board game, using tiny people as the pieces.

Option 3: Your friend wants to know more about the ancient one

Option 4: The group turns on some music and starts to dance.
13141434341.title: The ancient one

choices: Alone with the powerful woman
Playing with shrunken victims
A conversation with the ancient woman
Following the powerful giantess
Other
131414343413.content:
“Tell me, what else do you know about the ancient one?” The boy asked. You sighed and looked at her. The ancient one had sat just above you so you could only see her bare foot.

“I’ve heard many stories. It’s said that she has been around since the beginning of time. Her power is second to none. From what my grandmother told me, many people believe she was the true cause to a lot of things.”

“Like what?”

“Some people say she was the one who killed the dinosaurs. Some say she was the one who destroyed Atlantis. There are some who even say she makes her home in the Bermuda Triangle.” You explained. Your friend was silent for a bit before speaking up.

“Does she…really know where we are?”

“If she says she knows then she’s telling the truth. We are now under her mercy. She did say it wasn’t time yet or something so I don’t think she’ll go for us yet. As I said before though, if she wants to eat us then we won’t be able to stop her.”

You listened to the giants talk. Each one of them had a desire to eat you but none of them was as scary as the ancient one. You even believed Emma was soft and innocent compared to her.

“I’ve…encountered her once.” You say. Your friend turned to you, curious.

“She came was when I was born. When everything had calmed down after my birth, she appeared at the hospital. My grandma said my mother was afraid the ancient one would take me there and then.”

“What did she do?”

“The ancient one…she kissed me on the forehead. She said I was destined for the adventure of a lifetime.”

“Well…she wasn’t wrong I guess.”

“She’s never wrong. Or if she is, it’s part of her plan. After she spoke those words…she left.” You said. Your friend shuddered. He said your story was creepy. You didn’t blame him, you weren’t sure how to explain her visit. You only knew what your grandma told you and that didn’t help all that much.

After a few minutes passed…

Option 1: The girls decided to head out and collect victims for the party. The ancient one decided to stay behind, making you worried.

Option 2: The girls decided to sit in the middle of the living room and play with the tinies they currently had

Option 3: The ancient one suddenly invaded your mind to talk to you

Option 4: The ancient one moved to the kitchen to make some special food. Despite everything you believed in, you decided to follow her
131414343413.title: A past encounter

choices: Home to a new family
A different way of being arrested
Getting the whole party involved
A nice girl with hungry intentions
Other
131414343414.content:
After chatting for a little bit, the girls decided it was time for some fun. Your mother cleared the living room and turned on some music. She started to dance, letting her worried melt away. You couldn’t help but smile as she enjoyed herself. The ancient one suddenly stood up and also started dancing a little. She grabbed your aunt’s arm and helped her up. The woman blushed for a minute before smiling and joining her.

After a minute, the rest of the party decided to join in. The room soon became a sea of giant feet causing loud tremors along with the music. You didn’t mind though, it was kind of nice watching them. You wished you could join but you knew that wasn’t going to happen.

“They’re pretty good huh?” You said. Your friend on the other hand had different thoughts. You soon noticed his expression and became a little confused.

“What’s wrong?”

“Are you kidding me? We’re currently trapped with 8 hungry girls who want to turn us into food! My worst nightmare is among them along with a giant woman who knows exactly where we are and what we’ll do before we can do it! We need to leave now while they’re distracted!” He said.

“That…would be a bad idea. If you try to run, the ancient one could easily see you as irresistible. She loves it when prey try to run. I know we’re in a bad spot, but I think we can just relax for right now.” You stated.

“How do you figure that?”

“The ancient one may know about us, but it’s possible she’ll let us go. The thing is, I’m pretty sure she likes seeing boys struggle more than she does eating them. So as long as we don’t get on her bad side, there’s a chance she’ll simply watch us try to survive.” You tried to explain. In reality, you knew your chance of survival was pretty slim right now. It was very possible the ancient one would capture you and feed you to someone (or eat you herself) but you just had to hope for the best. After a couple of moments though, your friend shook his head.

“Forget this. We’re sitting ducks out here!” He said. Before you could react, he ran out the side of the couch towards the wall.

“No wait!” You yelled. You ran after him with a bad feeling in your stomach. As you predicted, the ancient one suddenly started moving towards your direction. Though you ran as fast as you could, the giantess was faster. She bent down and grabbed your friend. You helplessly watched as she opened up her bra a little and dropped the screaming boy in. She gave you a smile, making you tremble.

To your surprise though, the giantess suddenly turned and went back to dancing with the others. Though you didn’t understand, you instinctively ran after her. You had to try and help your friend, even if it was impossible. Before you could react, a giant foot stomped right next to you. Through your panicked state, you had just ran right into the sea of feet.

You started to dodge them as best as you could. All of the girls were completely unaware of you meaning you were on your own right now. The feet kept stomping and moving with blinding speed, almost crushing you many times. You were soon becoming tired and didn’t know how much longer you could last.

What you didn’t realize was that someone had finally spotted you. Before you could react, you were suddenly grabbed.

Option 1: It was Sarah, your old babysitter. She dropped you into her pants and pretended nothing happened. Sarah was planning to take you home with her and introduce you to her family.

Option 2: It was Bethany, the cop. She dropped you into her pocket and went out to the backyard. She was going to decide what to do with you.

Option 3: It was your mother. She outright revealed you to everyone in the party causing all of their attention to turn on you.

Option 4: It was your cousin, Katie. She took you up to her room so the two of you could talk.
131414343414.title: A fool’s quick decision

choices: Being introduced to the family
Next to a sleepy friend
Captured within a short amount of time
A silent rescue mission
Other
1314143434141.content:
When you looked up, you saw your babysitter smiling down at you. Before you could react, the giantess suddenly opened up her pants and held you over it. You started to squirm, realizing what she was planning to do. The giantess simply giggled and dropped you in, closing the opening up.

Physically, were quite comfortable next to her but you were both nervous and a bit embarrassed. You knew she wanted to eat you up and it felt a little awkward being next to her womanhood.
—————
As Sarah closed up her pants, she smiled. She was so happy to have you in her possession. She continued to dance, pretending nothing changed. After all, she didn’t want to lose her special little morsel so quickly.

The rest of the night was pretty special. She hung out with people she cared about, playing games and watching a movie. She happily devoured a few tiny men that Bethany had brought as well. Throughout the whole time, she couldn’t stop thinking about how she had finally captured you.

As people were leaving, Sarah happily gave Deborah and Jane a hug before getting in her car. When she started it though, the ancient one suddenly stepped into the passenger seat. This startled the girl and made her a little nervous.

“You don’t mind if I ride with you, do you?” She asked. Sarah shook her head and started driving. She was pretty quiet, not knowing what to say. After a minute, her passenger spoke up again. “I know you have him.” She said.

“O-oh, really?” Sarah responded. “I was thinking of taking him home so my family and I could maybe tease and play with him before we tossed him into the frying pan. Is…that bad?” The ancient one shook her head.

“The thought of a tiny man struggling at the hands of a beautiful girl is nice. Besides, I’m no different.” She said. Sarah calmed down and became curious. “You see, just before you captured him, I grabbed his little friend. I have him with me right now and I’m going to take him home with me as well. I’ll play with him to my heart’s content before sending him down my gullet.”

“Ooh, sounds interesting. Do you have any suggestions for me?”

“Well if you wanted to, you could swallow someone in front of him as a preview. It’s just an idea though.” Sarah soon got to her place and parked.

She and the ancient one stepped out and smiled at each other. Before Sarah could say anything, the ancient one approached and kissed her on the lips. The girl blushed, losing her words once more. The ancient woman smiled and leaned towards her ear.

“Just make sure you enjoy him. He’s a very special tiny in more ways than one.” She said. Sarah nodded making her friend smile. The ancient one took a step back and used her magic to teleport away.

When Sarah pulled you out, she noticed you had fallen asleep. She gave you a small kiss before taking you inside.
—————
When you woke up, it was the next day. You were…

Option 1: On a table surrounded by Sarah and her family. They were all smiling and wanted to have fun with you.

Option 2: On a pillow in Sarah’s bedroom. Sarah was still asleep next to you.

Option 3: In the kitchen inside of a jar. It seems one of Sarah’s family members had already gotten to you.

Option 4: Under Sarah’s bed. A tiny human had rescued you after the giantess went to sleep.
1314143434141.title: Going home with the babysitter

choices: Food first, games later
Hide and seek
An intense game to play
Taking turns
Other
13141434341411.content:
You slowly woke up and yawned. Yesterday had been a pretty crazy day, so much so that you started to think it was just a dream. As you became more focused though, you soon saw Sarah right in front of you. She was still giant and smiling at you. You gave a sigh, realizing everything had really happened.

“Hello Sarah, will I be joining your breakfast today?” You asked. The giantess giggled and licked her lips.

“Hm…a tiny man placed upon a piece of toast with jelly on it. Sounds pretty good, but no, we’re going to play with you first.” She said. You became a little confused at first before your vision cleared up. Once you were more focused, you noticed her family was sitting next to her. The giantess giggled as you flinched.

“My my, he must have been tired. Perhaps you should introduce us so we’re not complete strangers.” The woman to her left said. Sarah nodded and carefully picked you up.

The person on Sarah’s left was the first person she introduced you to. Her name was Heather and she was Sarah’s girlfriend She had dark skin and short dark hair.. Heather was an athletic person who loved to devour tiny men.

The next person Sarah introduced was her younger sister, Nora. She was 19 years old with curly ginger hair. After a moment, you soon recognized her from school. She had a bit of a crush on you and liked hanging out with you. She liked to read romantic stories and was exceptional at cooking. You considered asking her out on a date once but didn’t have the confidence to do so. You had no idea she was related to Sarah.

There was also Janet, Sarah’s mother. Janet was 51 years old with long blond hair. She was the head of the household and provided her family tiny men whenever they wanted. The woman was deaf but that didn’t stop her from enjoying her prey. Instead of hearing them yell, she would take the time to feel her prey squirm inside of her mouth.

The last person Sarah introduced was her maid, Sophie. The girl was 25 years old and was typically a serious person. Though she hadn’t been born into a family of witches, Sarah gladly took her in and taught her. Sophie despised men and saw them as completely inferior. Even in school, she would treat boys as simply toys Andy objects. Whenever she found a loose tiny men in the house, she would make sure he was dealt with thoroughly.

Sarah’s family also had a golden retriever named Zoe. The girl had trained it to eat tiny men whole. The dog loved them and was excited whenever she got to eat one.

“So Sarah, what should we do to him first?” Nora asked. The girl smiled and thought about it.

Option 1: They decided to eat breakfast first. During breakfast, they would add you to their food and tease you, showing you what it will be like when they really do eat you.

Option 2: They decided to play a game of hide and seek. One person would hide you while everyone else would look for you.

Option 3: They decided to play a game of musical chairs. You would be stuck on one of them and helplessly wait to be sat on.

Option 4: They decided to take turns playing and teasing you. Each one would take you into their room for a bit before you were handed off to the next woman.
13141434341411.title: Sarah’s family

choices: You move to a better spot
You are found
131414343414112.content: The giantesses decided to play a game of hide and seek with you as the delicious prize. Sarah took you and hid you in the living room under couch behind one of the legs and went back to the others. She told them you had been hidden and they then scattered round the house looking for you.
131414343414112.title: Hide and seek

choices: Sarah saves you
Something else happens
13141434341413.content: You woke up and immediately realised that you were no longer with Sarah and looking around, that you were in a jar in what appears to be a teenage girls room. Suddenly you hear a belly growling and look at where the noise came from and saw that indeed you were in a teenagers room as standing behind you in her Sleep wear was Sarah's little sister who rubbed her eyes before looking at you. She licks her lips and says that she had seen you in her sisters room and had stolen you so she can eat you herself.
13141434341413.title: Captured within a short amount of time

choices: Becoming part of her dream
A lovely morning chat
A quiet family member
The pit of permanent banishment
Other
133.content:
As you continue your ascent, you can’t help but admire your grandma’s size. She was so big and powerful compared to you now. You were happy you were getting her help, her strength would be enough to protect you.

You soon reached her large soft belly. When you stepped on it, the entire thing grumbled. You chuckled and wondered what sort of victims did she ensnare last night. By victims, you meant actual food, it’s just that you’ve always seen her stomach as a prison for her treats. Anything that went into her mouth would never escape. You started to rub her belly causing her to move a little.

“Mm…you look really tasty.” She mumbled in her sleep. You smiled, knowing what she was going on in her head. The way she described her dreams was that she dreamed of being an unstoppable Titan. Her “food” cowered at the sight of her and even tried to run. It made your grandma happy as she grabbed her food and ate them one by one. You absolutely loved it when she won, you believed her stomach deserved any treat it desired.

Once you were done rubbing your grandma’s belly…

Option 1: Your grandma suddenly grabbed you and brought you up to her mouth. You realized she was sleep moving and thought you were one of her treats from her dream.

Option 2: Your grandma soon woke up and saw you on her belly. She gave a smile and spoke up.

Option 3: Your aunt suddenly came into the room and saw you on her belly. Being very quiet, she grabbed you and warned you not to wake her up.

Option 4: You continued your journey until you got to her mouth. You were going for her ear but her mouth was pretty interesting and made you want to check it out.
133.title: The soft but deadly belly of your grandma

choices: Katie snatches you up, an evil grin creeping across her face
Katie holds out her hand so you can step onto her palm
Katie's tummy rumbles and she giggles at the sight of you
Katie looks worried and calls for her mommy, your Aunt Jane
Before Katie can act, 11 year old Sophie enters and spots you
14.content:
You’re not sure who you can trust and eventually decide that your youngest cousin, 6 year old Katie, might at least be a friendly face. She’s always enjoyed your company and, being an imaginative little girl, might be more open-minded to your current predicament. Checking that the coast is clear, you creep across the floor towards Katie’s room. The door is shut but, with a bit of effort, you are able to wriggle underneath the door and find yourself in the little girl’s bedroom.

Katie is already up and playing on the bedroom floor. She hasn’t got dressed yet and is just wearing a pair of cute pink briefs. She looks adorable, with her unruly blonde curls, sky blue eyes and cheeky, playful smile. She’s a picture of innocence and, whilst you are not sure how wise it is to approach a small child, but Katie has always been a sweet little thing.

Taking a deep breath, you start to walk towards your little cousin, waving your arms to get her attention. Katie hears your tiny voice and quickly spots you as you walk across the carpet towards her...
14.title: You choose another room.

choices: A sudden taste test
A sibling reunion
Aunt Jane
A dangerous game
Other
142.content:
The little girl gives you a smile and holds out her hand for you. You take a deep breath and step on. As she starts to lift you up into the air, the motion causes you to fall down. You shudder realizing how high up you are.

“It really is you!” Katie said. You clamber uneasily back to your feet and nod.

“Listen, I need your help! I don’t know how I’ve shrunk and I’m pretty helpless in this state!” You state. Your cousin giggles.

“You were shrunk by magic. Mommy said to not tell you until it happened.” She explains. You roll your eyes, believing that part was obvious. After a moment, you suddenly notice her second statement.

“Wait…what do you mean your mother told you to not say anything? Does she know I’m shrunk?” The girl nods.

“Yeah! We’ve been waiting.” You weren’t sure how to respond to that. If they had been waiting for you to shrink, why didn’t they tell you it would happen? The best guess you had was that they didn’t want you to worry.

“Do you know if there’s a way to fix this?” You ask. Katie shakes her head, making you lose hope. Her belly suddenly grumbles, startling you. Normally you would have found the noise of your little cousin's gurgly tummy to be cute, but something about the way she is looking at you sends shivers down your spine.

"I'm hungry!" Katie announces, grinning cheekily.

“We should probably go downstairs for breakfast.” you say, hoping that Katie agrees.

“Yay! Breakfast! Yummy yummy for my tummy!” Katie says. You nod, not thinking about her words. You are oblivious to the look in her eyes. After a minute…

Option 1: Katie licks you and loves how you taste

Option 2: Your older sister, Emma, comes in to get Katie when she spots you

Option 3: Katie takes you downstairs and finds her mother, your Aunt Jane

Option 4: Katie asks if you want to play a game with her. Not thinking about the danger she poses, you agree
142.title: A young but strong girl

choices: Katie pops you inside her mouth
Katie dangles you above her mouth
Katie burps in your face and laughs
Aunt Jane enters and “saves” you from Katie
Katie’s 12 year old sister, Sophie, enters
1421.content:
“Yay! Breakfast! Yummy yummy for my tummy!” Katie says. You nod, not thinking about her words. You are oblivious to the look in her eyes. Suddenly, and without warning, Katie opens her mouth, stretches out her cute little pink tongue and licks you fully across your torso and face. Your senses of touch and smell are subject to a barrage of unexpected sensory stimuli. The hot aroma of your youngest cousin’s breath fills your nostrils. She hasn’t yet brushed her teeth so the overwhelming scent is stale and somewhat gross. Little Katie has also always had something of a sweet tooth, which probably explains the underlying cloying sweetness that you can smell.

The wet surface of Katie’s cute pink tongue is softer than anything else you have ever felt as it glides across your skin. The sensation of being tasted is actually very pleasant and the girl’s taste buds tickle you as she licks your tiny body. You find yourself coated liberally in Katie’s spit. As she pulls away after the first tentative lick, a loop of slippery saliva stretches between you and her tongue.

“Mmmmmm! You taste super delicious, cousin. I’m so glad you came into my room this morning. You're the best and tastiest cousin in the whole world! You’re going to be the yummiest breakfast I’ve ever eaten! It'll be funny when you're in my tummy... and even funnier when I poop you out! Ha ha ha! You're going to be my poop!” Katie starts giggling at the thought of what will happen to you when she eats you.

You can hardly believe your ears. This is not going well for you and if you don’t do something quickly, you’re going to end up inside Katie’s cute little tummy, just like any other breakfast, and then you really WILL end up as this cute little girl's poop! You open your mouth to protest but Katie’s tongue licks you again, more vigorously this time. You are dripping with her saliva as she licks you again and again.

“Please, Katie…” you whimper. “Please don’t eat me!”

It doesn’t seem like Katie is listening, however. Instead of licking you again, she opens her mouth even wider and stretches out her cute pink tongue in welcome…
1421.title: A sudden taste test

choices: Drops you in
Something else happens
14212.content: Your little cousin dangles you over her open mouth giving you an Excellent view of her mouth and her throat. Saliva drips from the roof of her mouth as she teasingly lowers you closer and closer to her maw.
14212.title: Katie dangles you above her mouth

choices: She swallows
Something else happens
142121.content: You are suddenly dropped into your young cousins mouth and she closes it behind you slowly. She then rolls you round her tongue and pressed you into her cheeks and held you there for a few seconds before she let you drop back to the floor of her mouth. She then pins you under her tongue and started sucking on you like a delicious squirming candy. You try to escape her mouth and she playfully let's you get to her soft lips before her saliva coated tongue pulls you back into the hot tight confines of her mouth.
142121.title: Drops you in

info.brief_description: Your family are witches and want to eat you.
info.description:
You are a healthy and happy young man of 18 years old. Your life is about to change forever. Unknown to you, you have been born into a family of witches. You live with your grandmother, your mother and older sister, your aunt and two young cousins. All males in your family have an unusual medical condition causing them to shrink down to just an inch tall. No-one can predict when the shrinking will take effect so the women in your family chose not to tell you and pledged to give you the most normal life they possibly could until the shrinking took effect. As witches, however, every single one of them from your kindly grandmother to your six year old cousin, enjoy eating male humans. Every single one of them wants to eat you alive but have agreed to wait until you shrink.

As witches, these ladies also have the ability to shrink other men (never women) who they enjoy devouring. They've managed to keep this secret from you... until now.

Female Family Members

Grandmother: Anne (68 years old) A plump lady with a kindly face. Your grandmother has always been affectionate and loving towards you. She loves her food.

Mother: Deborah (45 years old)
Older Sister: Emma (22 years old)

Aunt: Jane (38 years old)
Younger Cousin: Sophie (11 years old)
Youngest Cousin: Katie (6 years old)

RULES: PLEASE READ!

Basically, NOTHING OVERTLY SEXUAL should happen to any characters younger than 18. It is fine for the younger witches to eat our hero or to be seen eating any other tiny shrunken guys, but they mustn't engage in any sexual acts or be objectified sexually. As for having younger shrunken guys, I guess the limit would be about 16 for a younger tiny guy. The same rule would apply, however. It is fine for him to get eaten (and I sincerely hope any tinies that appear in this story end up in a giantess witch's belly at some point) but he shouldn't engage in any overtly sexual interactions.

The female characters in this story will follow the same rules. Whilst they have no problem eating guys of any age (they're witches after all), only tiny's aged 18+ would ever be fair game in their eyes for sexual encounters.

ALL of the older witches, (22 year old Emma, Aunt Jane, Mom Deborah and Grandmother Anne), are inclined to have a bit of sexy fun with tinies aged 18 or over (depending on their mood). Whatever else they do, however, there should never be any doubt that they intend to eat any and all tinies they encounter (and especially our hero - who they see as the very finest and tastiest treat of all).

Finally, there is no "way out" of this scenario for any of the tinies. Ultimately, any tiny in this story should end up getting eaten. If our hero is eaten, he would always be swallowed whole. Other tinies could be eaten however the author of the chapter sees fit (so chewing of secondary character tinies is permitted where it fits the scene and story).

I reserve the right to edit chapters to maintain continuity and adherence to these rules.
